Author: whoisthis8295
Text: It’s funny because I’m the exact opposite. The number on the scale will stay the same or barely budge, meanwhile the jeans i bought two weeks ago are now baggy. But the number is all i go by, no matter what. 1 pound gain will drive me insane. That stupid number makes me restrict more even though rationally i know that if my clothes are getting looser, I’m losing weight.
